thread.title: BRIEF-Mapfre Updates Terms Of Strategic Alliance With Banco Do Brasil‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mapfre Updates Terms Of Strategic Alliance With Banco Do Brasil‍​

organizations.name: brief-mapfre updates terms of strategic alliance with banco do brasil‍​ feb

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Mapfre SA:
* SIGNS NON-BINDING MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING (MOU) TO UPDATE TERMS OF THE STRATEGIC ALLIANCE BETWEEN MAPFRE AND BANCO DO BRASIL‍​
* TO OWN 100 PERCENT (CURRENTLY 50 PERCENT) OF BUSINESS GENERATED BY AGENCY NETWORK, AUTOMOBILE AND LARGE RISKS BUSINESS IN BB BANK CHANNEL
* SAME CURRENT SHAREHOLDER CONFIGURATION FOR LIFE AND AGRICULTURE INSURANCE TO BE MAINTAINED
* TO KEEP EXCLUSIVITY IN BANCO DO BRASIL BANK CHANNEL FOR ALL THE BUSINESSES IN SCOPE OF THE ALLIANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
